llm_command:
kubectl apply -n cartservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-redis-cart
  namespace: cartservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cartservice
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: redis-cart
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 6379
EOF
